testcase.name: Given I am on the Home Page
And I see a Logo Banner
When I click SignIn Button
And I enter user email "bennaroh@gmail.com" details
And I enter user password "" details
And I click the Login Button
Then I see an error "Password is required" message details
| bennaroh@gmail.com | | Password is required |
Given I am on the Home Page
And I see a Logo Banner
When I click SignIn Button
And I enter user email "bennaroh@gmail.com" details
And I enter user password "benedith12" details
And I click the Login Button
Then I should be logged in successfully
And I sign out
